channel.title: Newbies on Bayme.sh
channel.description: Recent content in Newbies on Bayme.sh

item.title: MQTT
item.description: This is on the most advanced side of things. If you don’t know what “MQTT” is, leave it disabled. MQTT is the technology used to feed the mesh data to the internet (aka what powers the Mesh Maps, Discord Logger, etc). Setting up MQTT is totally optional and should only be done on a staticly installed node with strong and reliable internet access (like a node on your roof). If you are just using a portable node, you do not need to take any actions.
